front-matter-description.Layout_FrontMatterHeader: If set, specifies the theme layout file to use. Use the layout file name without the extension. e.g. 'Theme'
front-matter-description.Template_FrontMatterHeader: Name of liquid template in the theme used to display this page by including the {{ page.content }} expression
front-matter-description.Permalink_FrontMatterHeader: Refer to the URLs (excluding the domain name or directory folder) for your pages, posts. Possible values :folder/:categories/:year/:month/:day/:title, my-page, :folder/my-page
front-matter-description.Published_FrontMatterHeader: Set to false if you do not want a specific post to be diplayed when the site is generated
front-matter-description.Category_FrontMatterHeader: Instead of placing posts in folders, you can specify one or more categories to which the post belongs. When the site is generated, the post will behave as if it had been placed in those categories normally. Categories (plural key) can be specified as a YAML list or a comma-separated string
front-matter-description.Tags_FrontMatterHeader: Similar to categories, one or more tags can be added to a post. Also like categories, tags can be specified as a YAML list or as a comma-separated string
front-matter-description.Alias_FrontMatterHeader: Define aliases for individual pages by specifying them in the YAML front matter. These aliases can be used for redirection
front-matter-description.Authorize_FrontMatterHeader: Set to true if you want to block anonymous access to the page

VirtoCommerce.Content.description: Export/Import pages, themes, links, menu items
